name: STACC
description:
Notice: If you encounter a bug that locks you in a black screen after falling/resetting/winning, please refresh the page. You can also play the windows version instead, as the bug doesn't appear as often as the web version. We will release a fix after the voting session ends. We apologize for the inconveniences.

Controls:

  • WASD -> Move
  • Shift -> Use jetpack
  • Z -> Undo
  • R -> Reset

A cyber-themed puzzle game created in 48 hours for GMTK 2021.

In the cyberspace, you need to think carefully because you only have several moves before you have to use your jetpack, the jetpack got fueled by your previous moves. Synthesize your thoughts, wave your way to the finish line, and remember to use THE STACC for your gain.

Credits:

  • Code -> Harits
  • Level -> Mail, Raveno
  • Art -> Farhan, Harits
  • Sound -> Raveno

Sound creds:
https://freesound.org/people/C3Sabertooth/sounds/480870/
https://kenney.nl/assets/impact-sounds
https://kenney.nl/assets/digital-audio
https://free-sample-packs.com/300mb-free-synthwave-sample-pack/

Special thanks to our friends, Fandok and Izzan, for testing our game!
